colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I MJUG TU 'DON RGYU'I 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DKA' BCU SMRA BA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DANG, CHOS MDZAD 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG PHYUG DANG, SKYOR DPON RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG SBYIN PA, DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS, DGE TSUL NAM MKHA' DON GRUB RNAMS KYI NAN TAN CHEN PO NAS GSOL BA BTAB PA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHVA SER COD PAN 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA'I SDES CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO, DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA'I SDE,
